title: Gemini

nouns: Gemini is the third astrological sign in the Zodiac, originating from the constellation of Gemini.
A person who is born while the sun is in Gemini.
(astrology) a person who is born while the sun is in Gemini
One of the constellations of the zodiac
A zodiacal constellation in the northern hemisphere between Taurus and Cancer on the ecliptic
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Gemini is one of the constellations of the zodiac.

description: The Gemini astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents Twins.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Gemini emoji is represented by two intertwined figures, a classic artistic depiction symbolizing the duality and versatility of the sign. Apple's design imbues these figures with a sense of harmonious balance, using soft rounded edges and subtle shading to highlight their connection. This emoji, rendered with the characteristic Apple sheen, is frequently used to represent people born under the Gemini zodiac sign, or to signify a dual nature, adaptability, and lively communication.
